attributes.action: appoint the person(s) who revealed details of MPs' expense claims, if they are uncovered by the current leak enquiry, as the new commissioner(s) for parliamentary standards, on a suitably large salary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given what we now know about MPs' abuse of the expenses system, the person or persons who have blown the whistle on this information and passed it to the Daily Telegraph have performed an important public service. They should be recognised for this through the award of a role which reflects their personal commitment to public service and remunerates them appropriately (in contrast to many MPs and peer, who appear to have been remunerated inappropriately.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
